description: Came second runners-up in #ShowYourSkill where we participated in the Research & Reports Track and creating a NLP augmented Machine Learning Application for women safety.

Came runners-up in BobHacks where we built a pattern recognition API built on top of the MetaBob API. The API is able to assist users in tracking common errors and delivers pattern recognition on the MetaBob API.

award honour: First Prize - Code Innovation Series - associated with GitHub
description: Innovation Series Hackathon was the hackathon organized by by Manipal Institute of Technology. Employed Document-Embedding for measuring contextual similarity between multiple pages and given search-queries.

award honour: First Prize - HackRx by Bajaj Finserv
description: HackRx is the Annual Hackathon hosted by Bajaj Finserv. Used Deep Learning and Classical Image processing to achieve a face verification and profile-rank estimation task. The methodology out-performed classic Deep Learning methods. Created an API for the same.

award honour: First Prize - ACM UCM Datathon - UC Merced
description: Won the ACM UCM Datathon, built DeCrise, an online platform that acts as an aggregator for public support/utility services for fast-response during a major crisis or disaster.

award honour: Runners-Up - Paper Presentation - IEEE SBM Manipal
description: Presented a preliminary investigation of Federated Learning integrated with Continual Learning for Crisis Management.

award honour: First Prize - Community & Civic Engagement track of CalHacks Hackathon
description: Won under the Community & Civic Engagement track of CalHacks Hackathon organized by UC Berkeley. Built Voix, an anonymous platform for uplifting communities and promoting civic participation. It is a social media platform that utilizes privacy-enabled machine learning to recover ideas affecting communities and bring them to the top of our platform while conserving user identity.

award honour: Runners-Up - Furniture Identification - IECSE x VISION
description: Employed skip-connections to generate high-performance model for furniture identification.

award honour: Runners-Up - IEEE BigMM Data Challenge - IEEE Grand-Challenge
description: Came runners-up in IEEE Grand-Challenge for harassment detection on tweets. Utilized Elementary Classifiers for Sentiment Analysis. The team was invited to present a paper in IEEE Sixth International Conference on Multimedia Big Data (BigMM).
Honored to be selected as one of the recipients of the Intel Edge AI Scholarship Program. Learnt about Machine Learning Implementation on the Edge.
